item.title: Ghislaine Maxwell interview released by DOJ
item.description: The Trump administration has been criticized for reneging on promises to release files about sex offenders Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

item.title: Canada drops many of its retaliatory tariffs on the U.S.

item.title: Trump says he'll fire Fed Governor Lisa Cook 'if she doesn't resign'
item.description: President Donald Trump said Friday he will fire Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook if she does not resign from her position.
